recipe.title: Simple Green Salad with Celery Seed and Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 heads green leaf lettuce (about 2 pounds total), torn into bite-size pieces
instructions: Mince and mash garlic to a paste with 1/4 teaspoon salt, then whisk together with celery seeds, vinegar, and oil in a large bowl. Add lettuce and toss to coat.
